subject: Paralysis
Horse Racing
Families and Family Life
Alcohol Abuse
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Struggle has not been unusual for jockey Andrew Lakeman, who has battled with drug addiction in the past. Yet now he must reckon with yet another obstacle: paralysis.
snippet: Struggle has not been unusual for jockey Andrew Lakeman, who has battled with drug addiction in the past. Yet now he must reckon with yet another obstacle: paralysis.
